title: Snuffed
description: WARNING: This book is not just dark—it’s horrific, depraved and disturbing. If you do not enjoy books containing blood, guts, taboo and more, this book is not for you.  What goes up must come down, and in the case of Sofia Vavilov – that time is now. A struggle for power is coming to a head, but the question remains… Who will be the victor? The Dmitrievs, or the Vavilovs?
author: Bonny Capps
